scripts.update: dotenv cross-var 'aws lambda update-function-code --zip-file fileb://.zip/code.zip --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME} && aws lambda wait function-updated --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME}'
scripts.invoke: dotenv cross-var 'aws lambda invoke --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME} --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload=file://events/sample.json  out.json --log-type Tail --query LogResult --output text |  base64 -d && echo `cat out.json`'
